DOC.brief_summary: GW869682 cause glucose excreted urine . The purpose study see whether enough calorie glucose excrete urine cause weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss In Obese Subjects Taking Either GW869682 Or Placebo 3 Times Per Day For 12 Weeks
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Have BMI within range 30.0 40.0kg/m2 , inclusive . Females meet criterion must physiologically incapable become pregnant ( ie. , surgically sterilize , postmenopausal per protocol definition ) . Exclusion criterion : History eat disorder . Recent history weight loss gain . Had gastrointestinal surgery treatment obesity . Type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus . Have positive urine drug screen . Have liver disease . Have hepatitis B , hepatitis C , HIV antibody . Have thyroid disorder control medication . Have disease ( heart , liver , blood , nervous system , kidney disease , cancer ) . Are unable participate exercise program . Have use weight loss drug within 3 month start study . Are currently use warfarin , digoxin , oral anticoagulant ( aspirin nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ) , oral injectable corticosteroid ( inhale & intranasal corticosteroid permit ) , antiretroviral medication . Used investigational drug device study within 30 day prior 1st dose study medication . High low blood pressure .
